summary: make nearly and npc in skyrim a follower.
descriptionHtml:
This Mod is a bat file that will allow you to make nearly a follower.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Instruction\\\'s
-Download and Install - Put the file in the Data folder
-Open Skyrim up - Double click SkyrimLauncher
-Find A Npc in the game - look.
-open the console - normally opened by using the ` button or the ~ button
-click on npc - use the mouse/controller to guide the arrow onto an npc and click action button X/A/E
-type - bat Follower
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
My Other Mods:
Isandaar Hideout  -   http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34352
Make NPCs Followers  -   http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34497
Bat Teleports For Quick Travelling  -   http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34595
EpiclyWhit3s Mods and Info  -   http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34666
Marriable NPCs  -   http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34655
Unenchanted Thieves Armour Set - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34971
Thieves Vault - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34952

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
EpiclyWhit3
